mapper.select: select tp.*,ts.student_name,td.dormitory_num,ta.apartment_name,bed.bed_num from tb_people tp left join tb_student ts on ts.id = tp.student_id left join tb_dormitory td on ts.dormitory_id = td.id left join tb_apartment ta on td.apartment_id = ta.id left join tb_bed bed on ts.bed_id = bed.id where tp.id= #{id}
